inputs.name: packageId
inputs.label: Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: The package ID of the package to install. Check https://chocolatey.org/ for available packages

inputs.name: packageVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specific version of the package to install. Leave empty if you want to install the latest stable version.

inputs.name: alternateSource
inputs.label: Alternate package source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source to find the package(s) to install. Special sources include: ruby, webpi, cygwin, windowsfeatures, and python. To specify more than one source, pass it with a semi-colon separating the values (-e.g. 'source1;source2'). Defaults to default feeds.

inputs.name: extraOptions
inputs.label: Other options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add extra options or switches as needed.
